name: scms
description: This is the node js backend for the react-scms application. It is made up of Nodejs, an API backend JavaScript framework. This an open source school management system API built with Nodejs and Django-rest framework for managing school or college. It provides an API for administration, admission, attendance, schedule and results. It also provide users with different permissions to access various apps depending on their access level.
author: mwinamijr
